== I had some failed attempts to make a purchase. Could you cancel my incomplete transactions? ==

The incomplete transactions should automatically expire after a few days.  Please wait 7 days from the date of your failed purchase, then check your bank account again.  If the payment still shows up, <nowiki>[[Pay|Contact Ubuntu Pay Support]]</nowiki> to get the transaction(s) cancelled manually.

You can also view your purchase history here, along with the current status of incomplete purchases:

  https://pay.ubuntu.com/payment/
